title: Can't access Firefox on Ventura 13.14 after May, 2023 update
content: Today I uploaded May 2023 Apple update. Neither MacBooks can access Firefox.
creator: howzzit

title: Possible fix for black screen videos with fine audio
content: I was having issues playing videos. All I would get was a black screen, but I could hear the audio. Although some videos, like facebook shorts, played just fine. And I could view videos in other browsers. Tried several things I saw suggested on threads having the same issues, but ultimately I uninstalled firefox and then reinstalled it and it seemed to have fixed the issue. Hopefully this helps others having the same issue. I tried to suggest it on a few of those threads but they were locked.
creator: dogscouts

title: Hello, did Mozilla/Firefox remove my AdBlocker this afternoon, 31may2023?
content: I want to know why it disappeared this afternoon, 31may2023. Web pages are now loaded with ads, etc.
creator: bradtoole745
